content.rendered:
February 2021

Dallas Developer Group

We’re pulling favorites from trusted sources, looking for testimonials on components that we can all make use of (free/open source). We’re hoping to have several Famous Faces join us and share their favorites.

If we use your suggestion, you will be entered into a drawing for 1 of 2 free blockchains. (No retail value)

Sadly these cool kids don’t record, you want to catch the awesome you gotta be there LIVE!

Salesforce MVP and Technical Architect then Technical Architect that also Manages the Delivery and Project Success ion the Technical side. Meighan went from admin to architect, taking the long path, and enjoyed the whole trip, gaining from the experiences and uses the admin, consultant, and prior in house life the better model projects from solution to deployment. Blogger – meighanrockssf.com, World Traveler for Salesforce — presenting at community run events, including but not limited to at Surf Force, North Africa Dreamin, YeurDreamin, to leading sessions at Connections, World Tours, Dreamforce (7 times) and more to being a 7 time Dreamforce speaker, , taught admins and devs in the West Bank in 2017, 7x Dreamforce speaker, co-host of Salesforce Developer Podcast System Dot Debug, Ohana Slack admin & co-founder (learn about OhanaSlack here and sign up here).

Amit Chaudhary

Amit is Salesforce MVP and founder/Co-organizer of Farmington Hills Developer Group. He’s an active blogger at http://amitsalesforce.blogspot.com.

Nana Gregg

Salesforce MVP HoF; FinancialForce Community Leader; Speaker; Flow Builder; Blogger; Tweeter; Administrator; Designer; Analyzer; Thinker; Creator

Stephan Chandler Garcia

Stephan Chandler-Garcia has spent many years working with the Salesforce platform as a customer, partner, and ISV. In 2019, he joined Salesforce in the UK as a Technical Architect and has since joined the Developer Advocate team where he focuses on Application Development, Experience Cloud, and Security. Follow Stephen on Twitter @stephanwcg or on Github at schandlergarcia.

jetpack-related-posts.title: DF18: DemoJam – Custom Themes
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce lets you build your own custom themes, package them up, and share and re-use them internally as well as sharing them across the entire Salesforce ecosystem. To celebrate, we're hosting a DemoJam where our Trailblazers will showcase their work, and the winner will be declared for the sharpest, coolest,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: System Dot Debug
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Who Are We? We're a Salesforce Developer podcast dedicated to bootstrapping new Salesforce users, admins, developers, and architects. This is our humble attempt at giving back to the community that has given so much to us! Come hang out with your hosts Meighan Brodkey, Nathan Pepper, Adam Daw, and RJ…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.
